mapper.sql: id, question_text, option_1, option_2, option_3, option_4, correct_answer, image_data, created_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName} ( id, question_text, option_1, option_2, option_3, option_4, correct_answer, image_data, created_at ) VALUES ( ${tableName}_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{question_text}, #{option_1}, #{option_2}, #{option_3}, #{option_4}, #{correct_answer}, #{image_data, jdbcType=BLOB}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT id, question_text, option_1, option_2, option_3, option_4, correct_answer, image_data FROM ( SELECT id, question_text, option_1, option_2, option_3, option_4, correct_answer, image_data, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( SELECT id, question_text, option_1, option_2, option_3, option_4, correct_answer, image_data FROM ${tableName} ORDER BY id DESC ) ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
